locations: Miami, Florida, USA::(WPBT2 Channel 2, 14901 Northeast 20 th Avenue Miami, Florida 33181)
imdb.plot outline: Check, Please. South Florida is a weekly, half-hour series hosted by chef Michelle Bernstein that gives amateur foodies the opportunity to review, rate and celebrate their favorite local restaurants. In every episode, she is joined by a panel of 3 everyday food critics, detailing their own experiences at three local restaurants. Michelle also prepares a quick recipe, demonstrating her own take on trendy menu items.
imdb.title: Check Please! South Florida
plot: Check, Please. South Florida is a weekly, half-hour series hosted by chef Michelle Bernstein that gives amateur foodies the opportunity to review, rate and celebrate their favorite local restaurants. In every episode, she is joined by a panel of 3 everyday food critics, detailing their own experiences at three local restaurants. Michelle also prepares a quick recipe, demonstrating her own take on trendy menu items.::Carolina Cuadra
